items: Completed HIPAA Privacy and Security training
Reviewed organization's HIPAA policies and procedures
Signed employee confidentiality agreement
Designated HIPAA Privacy Officer is identified and trained
Incident response plan reviewed and understood
Workstation screens are positioned to prevent unauthorized viewing
PHI is stored in locked cabinets or secure areas
Access to areas containing PHI is restricted to authorized personnel only
Devices storing ePHI are not left unattended
Paper records containing PHI are shredded or securely destroyed when no longer needed
Strong passwords and multi-factor authentication are enforced
PHI is encrypted during storage and transmission
Automatic screen locks are enabled on all devices
Audit logs are reviewed regularly for unauthorized access attempts
Antivirus and firewall protections are up to date
Patients have been informed of their privacy rights via Notice of Privacy Practices (NPP)
Procedures are in place to handle patient requests for access or amendment of PHI
Only the minimum necessary PHI is used or disclosed
BAAs (Business Associate Agreements) are in place with all third-party vendors handling PHI
All disclosures of PHI are logged as required
Risk assessment for ePHI systems completed within the past year
Data backups are encrypted and securely stored
Access control lists are regularly updated
Workforce members receive ongoing security reminders and updates
Security incidents are documented and investigated promptly
Staff understand how to recognize and report potential breaches
Incident reporting process is documented and accessible
Procedures exist to notify affected individuals within 60 days of breach discovery
Breach logs are reviewed and maintained
Communication templates for breach notifications are pre-approved by compliance
Annual HIPAA refresher training completed by all staff
Random compliance audits conducted at least twice per year
New hires complete HIPAA training before system access is granted
All policy updates are communicated to employees promptly
Compliance documentation retained for at least six years
